post:
Own Box KVM SSD Windows & Linux VPS hosting based in London, UK. That includes Snapshot backups, Anti DDoS protection and large choice of distributions to install, our VPS also comes with a feature packed control panel where you can upload your own ISOs, edit rDNS, view VNC and more.

**Linux KVM VPS 1**
1x2.2Ghz,
1GB RAM,
10GB SSD disk space,
1500GB Traffic 1Gbps port 100Mbps guaranteed,
1 IPv4 address,
24x7 UK based Support.
£2.99 a month ($3.81)

[Order now
](https://www.ownbox.co.uk/linux-vps-hosting)
**Linux KVM VPS 2**
2x2.2Ghz,
2GB RAM,
20GB SSD disk space,
Unmetered Traffic 1Gbps port 100Mbps guaranteed,
1 IPv4 address,
24x7 UK based Support.
£4.99 a month ($6.35)

[Order Now](https://www.ownbox.co.uk/linux-vps-hosting)

FEATURES
• Snapshot backups included.
• Reboot, Reinstall or configure VPS.
• Anti DDoS Protection included & IPv6 Ready!
• Over 16 different Linux & Windows distributions to deploy.
• Fast SSD RAID Storage, on UK nodes.
• Guaranteed Hardware Resources.
• Upload your own ISOs.
• Instant Deployment
• UK Support.

If you got any questions about any of our services, please do not hesitate to contact us.
